B

Book - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a book with title, author, price, ISBN, genre, and publication year.
Book(String, String, double, String, String, int) - Constructor for class Book
Constructs a Book instance with specified details.
BookManager - Class in Unnamed Package
Manages book records, including reading, validating, and organizing book data.
BookManager() - Constructor for class BookManager
 

D

do_part1() - Static method in class BookManager
Reads input files containing book records, validates each record, and adds valid records to output files.
do_part2() - Static method in class BookManager
Reads the genre-based CVS-formatted input text files produced in Part 1, one file at a time, creating an array of valid Book objects out of all the semantically valid book records in each input file, then serializes the resulting array of Book objects into the genre's binary file.
do_part3() - Static method in class BookManager
Reads the genre-based binary files produced in part 1, deserializes the array of Book objects in each file and provides an interacive program to allow the user to navigate the arrays.
